#summary some definitions of the pogel API.

= Object class =

constructors:
{{{
OBJECT();
OBJECT(unsigned int p);
OBJECT(POGEL::TRIANGLE* tri, unsigned long trinum, unsigned int p);
OBJECT(POGEL::TRIANGLE* tri, unsigned long trinum, unsigned int p, POGEL::POINT pos, POGEL::POINT rot);
                
OBJECT(const char* name);
OBJECT(const char* name, unsigned int p);
OBJECT(const char* name, POGEL::TRIANGLE* tri, unsigned long trinum, unsigned int p);
OBJECT(const char* name, POGEL::TRIANGLE* tri, unsigned long trinum, unsigned int p, POGEL::POINT pos, POGEL::POINT rot);
}}}

`p` properties.

`tri` an array of triangles.

`trinum` number of triangles in the array 'tri'.

`pos` a point object that is the object's position.

`rot` a point object for the object's rotation.

`name` a char array for the name of the object.
